title: CS564 Database Management?
body:
I was thinking whether I should take Database Management or nah. I could've chosen something elses instead because I have heard the workload of the class was quite high. But I was thinking since it statisfy physical science I can at the same time fulfill my gen-eds with this.   


Anyone who had taken this class has any suggestions if the material is useful, difficulty, etc.
comments: I'm assuming you're a CS major? If so you are probably going to have to deal with databases in your career, so why not learn about them?
